title: [K-12] 4C/ID Model-Based Educational Program for Enhancing Clinical Reasoning Skills in Dentistry

context.prior_knowledge: Basic dental science knowledge and understanding of patient care procedures
context.additional_context: Educational curriculum where a medium-sized learner group repeatedly performs tasks similar to real clinical scenarios in a limited technological environment (no PCs, smartphone-centric) and receives feedback.

learning_goals: Learners can apply systematic clinical reasoning processes in scenarios resembling actual dental cases with 80% accuracy.
Learners can utilize strategies to manage cognitive load by decomposing complex cases into three stages.
Learners can correct over 70% of their clinical judgment errors based on peer assessment and instructor feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
